# Project Plan Template (AI-Augmented)

> Use this template to outline your project strategy, break down work into phases and tasks, and track progress. Designed for projects leveraging AI personas and agents.

---

## 1. Project Overview
- **Project Name:**
- **Prepared by:**
- **Date:**
- **Summary:**
  - Briefly describe the project, its goals, and the intended use of AI personas/agents.

## 2. High-Level Roadmap
- **Phases/Epics:**
  - Phase 1: [e.g., Requirements & Planning]
  - Phase 2: [e.g., Design & Prototyping]
  - Phase 3: [e.g., Development]
  - Phase 4: [e.g., Testing & Review]
  - Phase 5: [e.g., Deployment & Handoff]

## 3. Phase-wise Task Breakdown

| Phase    | Task Description                        | AI Persona/Agent   | Status | Notes |
|----------|-----------------------------------------|--------------------|--------|-------|
| Phase 1  | Define product requirements             | Product Analyst    | ☐      |       |
| Phase 1  | Create initial project plan             | Project Manager    | ☐      |       |
| Phase 2  | Design user flows and wireframes        | UX Designer        | ☐      |       |
| Phase 3  | Implement core agent logic              | Python AI Dev      | ☐      |       |
| Phase 4  | Review and test agent outputs           | Solution Architect | ☐      |       |
| ...      | ...                                     | ...                | ☐      |       |

- Mark tasks as complete (☑), in progress (◐), or not started (☐) as you progress.

### Status Legend
- ☐ Not Started
- ◐ In Progress
- ☑ Done

## 4. Backlog / Future Tasks
- List additional tasks or ideas for future sprints.

## 5. Key Risks & Blockers
- Identify any current or potential risks, blockers, or dependencies.

## 6. Project Log / Changelog
- Maintain a running log of key decisions, changes, and progress updates.

---

*Leverage the expertise of AI personas at each phase to maximize productivity and quality. Keep this plan updated as the project evolves.*
